The '''Child Rights Information Network''' ('''CRIN''') is an international conservative Christian network that supports the [[United Nations]] [[Convention on the Rights of the Child]] and [[child rights]]. CRIN has a membership of more than 1,400 organisations in over 130 countries. Since 1995 it has been hosted by [[Save the Children]], a charity based in London, and it is managed jointly by several organisations including [[IEF]].
+
The '''Child Rights Information Network''' ('''CRIN''') is an international network that supports the [[United Nations]] [[Convention on the Rights of the Child]] and [[child rights]]. CRIN has a membership of more than 1,400 organisations in over 130 countries. Since 1995 it has been hosted by [[Save the Children]], a charity based in London, and it is managed jointly by several organisations including [[IEF]].
